title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS FORD RANGER/EVEREST (2015 – 2020) – FUEL MANAGER PRE FILTER KIT

content.rendered:
WESTERN FILTERS FORD RANGER/EVEREST (2015 – 2020) – FUEL MANAGER PRE FILTER KIT

Western Filters Ford Ranger & Ford Everest (2015 – 2020) PX2/PX3 Turbo Diesel Fuel Manager Pre Filter Kit with Bonus WF Filter removal tool OS-15-FM available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Western Filters Fuel Manager Fuel Filter Kit with WF Filter Removal Tool suits:

  • Ford Ranger 2015-2020 PX2 PX3 3.2L Turbo Diesel
  • Ford Everest 2015-2020 PX2 PX3 UA 3.2L Turbo Diesel

This vehicle specific kit includes a unique Western Filters bracket for the 3.2L models including; PX2 PX3 – Ranger and Everest models. This Kit is designed to be used as a Pre Filter, to separate water and contaminates from the vehicle’s fuel – thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. Includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need & even where to fit it!

Kit Includes:

  • 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager (Filters down to 30 Microns !)
  • Mounting Bolts, washers & nuts
  • Quality Fuel hose
  • Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket
  • Straight fittings
  • Blanking Plugs
  • Hose Clamps
  • Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)
  • Fittings to suit
  • WF Filter Removal Tool

Check out the full range of products available for your Ford Ranger & Ford Everest!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
